summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code chapter 25.09, relating to environmentally critical areas, and amending related provisions of Seattle Municipal Code Title 23, Sections 23.28.030, 23.22.058, 23.44.008, 23.44.010, 23.44.014, 23.44.024, 23.45.014, 23.45.056, 23.45.072, 23.53.010, 23.53.015, 23.53.020, 23.53.025, 23.53.030, 23.84.010, 23.90.002.
